item.title: About
item.description: who am I? Hi, My name is Fermidos. I coded some project on NLP and am learning Quantum Computing now, believing that these two technologies can change the world what I like crosstalk, Taichi quan, Ukelele, also, Iike the songs of Linkin Park and Eminem dream I have My dream is to control two companies, one does NLP, and the other does Quantum Computing. find more about my code on https://github.

item.title: 搭建hugo博客
item.description: hugo 是一个基于go语言的静态博客框架，和 hexo 一样，具有方便易上手的特点，对于较大数量的博客也能快速部署。因而很多人从hexo转移到了hugo。 搭

item.title: 关于输入法的文章
item.description: 不管是学习、工作还是上网冲浪，输入法都是我们接触最多、一旦选择了就不太容易改变的东西。所以它，很重要。抛开语音输入法不谈1，这里以谷歌拼音输
